thread.title: Texas governor credits Astros a little too quickly
thread.title_full: Texas governor credits Astros a little too quickly

author: Bay Area News Group
title: Texas governor credits Astros a little too quickly
text:
Texas governor credits Astros a little too quickly Bay Area News Group Posted: 10/12/2015 06:50:24 PM PDT Updated: 10/12/2015 06:50:25 PM PDT If the Houston Astros lose the American League Division Series, they'll have the perfect scapegoat in Texas governor Greg Abbott. 
An avid sports fan, Abbott didn't waste any time Monday congratulating the Astros for beating Kansas City and advancing to the A.L. Championship Series. Tweeted the governor, "Congrats to the @astros on advancing to the ALCS!. Hoping for an all-Texas #ALCS. Looking at you @Rangers." 
Seemed safe enough to send the tweet with the Astros ahead 6-2. It's just that the Royals then scored seven unanswered runs and won 9-6. The series is now tied 2-2, with the fifth and deciding game Wednesday in Kansas City. 
Ah, but wait a minute. The tweet, which eventually was deleted, apparently was sent by a staffer. Abbott advised Astros fans to unfollow him at @GovAbbott and switch to his personal account. Advertisement
